participant_1.background:
I used my artistic skills to teach children how to create beautiful and creative works of art.
I don't have a specific exercise routine, but I try to get some activity in most days of the week.
i m also a fulltime student studying radiology at local college.
i ve never been to the beach.
I play in a band that my parents don't know about.

participant_2.background:
I'm from the Midwest, where meat and potatoes are king.
i have a cat named leela.
i own a custom upholstery shop.
I am a genius, but my parents have no idea about my hobby.
i am 29 years old.

content.text: My name is participant_2, nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! What do you do for a living?
I own a custom upholstery shop, so I make chairs and furniture.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to make furniture.
It's not too difficult, but it takes a lot of patience and practice.
I'm sure it does. Do you have any other hobbies?
I play the piano and I love to read.
That's awesome! I'm not very musical, but I love to read too.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I love to read anything by Stephen King, but I also like to read historical fiction and thrillers.
I love Stephen King too! Have you read the new book that just came out?
No, I haven't yet. I'm waiting to get my hands on a copy.
It's really good! You should definitely check it out.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a great day!
